title: Effects of Soil Buffering on Plant Growth in Acid

content.question: Which of the following best describes how a scientist could accurately study the effects of soil buffering on plant growth in a region that is affected by acid deposition downwind of a coal-burning power plant?

choices.label: Measure changes in plant height over a year in a two different groups of trees; one group is <math alttext="5 kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>km</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> from the power plant and one group is <math alttext="10 kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>km</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> from the power plant.
Measure the changes in plant height over a year in two different groups of trees the same distance from the power plant; one group is in topsoil and one group is in topsoil with limestone added.

Measure changes in plant biomass over a year in two different groups of trees the same distance from the power plant; one group is not manipulated and one group is watered daily to dilute the deposition's acidity.

Measure changes in plant biomass over a year in two different groups of trees; one group is <math alttext="5 kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>km</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> from the power plant over limestone bedrock and one group is <math alttext="10 kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>km</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> from the power plant that has nitrogen and phosphorus added to the topsoil.

content.answer: Measure the changes in plant height over a year in two different groups of trees the same distance from the power plant; one group is in topsoil and one group is in topsoil with limestone added.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
